roleset.name: so slight as to be able to be disregarded

example.name: negligible-j
example.text: it is true that the utilitarian value of modern languages is negligible to too many college students

propbank.arg: the utilitarian value of modern languages

example.name: negligible-j
example.text: Therefore , earthquakes lower the Earth 's available elastic potential energy and raise its temperature , though these changes are negligible compared to the conductive and convective flow of heat out from the Earth 's deep interior .

propbank.arg: compared to the conductive and convective flow of heat out from the Earth 's deep interior

roleset.note: NEGLIGIBLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-earthquakes.
